cyclone.name: BERYL
cyclone.current_location: about 550 miles ESE of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west-northwest, forecast to cross the Lesser Antilles Sunday night and pass south of the Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico on Monday before moving into the central Caribbean.

weather_observation.watch_coast: Barbados, St. Lucia, Martinique, St. Martin, St. Barthelemy, Saba, St. Eustatius, St. Maarten
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Lesser Antilles, then the waters south of the Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico, moving toward the central Caribbean
weather_observation.wind: Low (14%) chance of brief tropical-storm-force gusts (≥34 kt) on Monday; otherwise breezy conditions.
weather_observation.rainfall: Around 1–2 inches of rain with locally higher pockets possible on Monday as the system passes to the south.
